price: Yoo sobsiiftota jallattoota irraa ta’e immoo,
arabic: وَأَمَّآ إِن كَانَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ ٱلضَّآلِّينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wa-ammā in kāna mina al-mukadhibīna al-ḍālīna
